search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Sendlane (sendlane.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Sendlane is: [https://www.sendlane.com/pricing](https://www.sendlane.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcfd42a1d06cd880266a30a/63d86e08dca70b0bf96bc780_quote.svg)

![Image 2: Image RXSG USA logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcfd42a1d06cd880266a30a/63dabe42f78f2a487a6fd77b_rxsg-logo.webp)

_“Sendlane’s customer service is superior to any other service we have ever used. They taught our team how to build email and SMS automations from scratch. In the past, our employees were unsure how automations worked. Now, they have a clear understanding of what is possible and how to execute it.”_

[Read full Customer Story](https://sendlane.webflow.io/customer-stories/rx-smart-gear)

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcfd42a1d06cd880266a30a/63d86e08dca70b0bf96bc780_quote.svg)

![Image 4: Image Lifeboost coffee logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcfd42a1d06cd880266a30a/63dabe505d2c8a5efc74c8dc_Lifeboost%20Logo.webp)

_“As soon as we switched to Sendlane, email deliverability went up by 39%, and revenue from email just keeps growing. One of the emails we sent generated $30k alone, other campaigns can easily bring in $10k-$15k each time, and our revenue per contact has increased to almost $83. Our goal is a million in revenue per month from email, and we’re pushing close now.”_

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcfd42a1d06cd880266a30a/63daa74ccdcb6b8ab932ac1b_Dr%20Charles%20Livingston.webp)

**Dr. Charles Livingston  
**

CEO

[Read full Customer Story](https://sendlane.webflow.io/customer-stories/lifeboost)

![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcfd42a1d06cd880266a30a/63d86e08dca70b0bf96bc780_quote.svg)

![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcfd42a1d06cd880266a30a/63d87612fb4657e2ce25c280_image%2063.webp)

_“We needed something with robust eCommerce email features that could grow with us but also easy enough to use that so we weren’t held back. Sendlane offered more flexibility with their Automations than MailChimp, and the customer service was the best by far. It was simple enough to build and send campaigns, but we can do so much more to help us grow. That’s huge.”_

![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcfd42a1d06cd880266a30a/63daa79aa67cd3f73f92f528_Leila%20Khoury.webp)

**Leila Khoury  
**

Director of Marketing

[Read full Customer Story](https://sendlane.webflow.io/customer-stories/madtasty)

Got Questions?
--------------

Do you offer a free trial?

Of course, we do! Give us a test drive for 60 days. The trial plan is limited to 100 contacts & 500 email sends. SMS is included only with paid accounts. At any point during your trial, you can upgrade to a paid plan.

How many contacts are included with each plan?

Our plans are based on what you send, not on the number of contacts in your account. This means contacts are unlimited.

Will I be allowed to change plans?

Yes, at any time! We're designed to scale with your business so as you grow, we grow with you! And don't worry, all of our prices will be prorated.

May I bring over existing contacts?

We offer a variety of migration services to help you bring over your active contacts and automations! This includes a simple import feature to help you quickly and efficiently upload and organize your entire marketing audience.

What payment types do you accept?

We accept all major credit and debit cards: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, & Discover.

Will I be able to integrate Sendlane with my website?

Of course! We give you all the tools, tracking pixels, and integrations necessary to help leverage our entire platform properly with your website. And of course, our 24/7 support team is on stand by whenever you're in need of a helping hand!

What kind of support do you offer? Is it available for trial accounts?

We want every single user to get the full Sendlane experience! For that reason, we do not restrict who gets support. Our customer support team is available to you 365 days a year, 24 hours a day. (Weekends & Holidays included) You'll have both live chat and email support (average 30-second response time!) along with unrestricted access to our knowledge base.

Does Sendlane offer an API integration? What about 3rd party integrations?

Absolutely! Our API docs [can be found here.](https://help.sendlane.com/article/83-api-docs) We also offer a full suite of enhanced integrations to provide you with the deepest data possible and automate your entire marketing experience from start to finish.

How easy is it to use your product?

All of our tools from the drag-and-drop email builder to the automations module are extremely visual and require very little technical knowledge to use. Our focus has always been on a great, user-friendly experience!

Have a different question?  
Visit our [knowledge base](https://help.sendlane.com/) or get in touch with our [support team](https://www.sendlane.com/contact-us).

[](https://www.sendlane.com/pricing#)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on usage and includes various tiers for email and SMS services.
